name: Konyamo Dorubako!! 2001
overview: Konya mo Dorubako is a TV-Tokyo program about Pachinko. The main casts are Sandwich man which is also Japanese comedian group and Nao Oikawa who is Japanese sexy actress. They introduce new machines of Pachinko and how to play new Pachinko. The show is still on air in Japan. Konya mo Dorubako!! 2001 is the third game based on the popular (in Japan) TV Show. The game features 2 game modes, in the main mode the player have to play the 2 different pachinko machines and try to win prizes, in the other mode (sort of a free mode) the player can choose one of the machines and then he can edit the different machine features, etc. The game also features a gallery of the show hosters, of the show prizes and also the 2 machines technical specifications.
